name: Boneyard Clicker
description:
"Definitely my favorite game about grave robbing." - UNDERLING 1

Welcome to the graveyard, where all of your hopes and dreams will come true! If those hopes and dreams involve raising a legion of troops for the skeleton wars.

Begin your quest for domination by clicking on the mounds of freshly dug graves. Keep clicking until you have enough bones for more plots! Now you've got the hang of it.

Summon minions to do the dirty work for you, upgrade them to work harder and faster, delve deep into the catacombs and other spooky activities. Once you've gathered a massive mound of bones, turn them into troops for the skeleton horde and do it all over again.

Boneyard Clicker – Because there's a spooky skeleton inside all of us.

"Desecrating graves has never been more fun!" - UNDERLING 2

What the hell is the difference between all the versions you may ask, well let me tell you-

  • Web Version - Free! No Ads! Plays in your browser! No bonuses :(
  • Standalone Windows/Mac/Linux Version - Costs 1/4 of a latte. HD quality! No Ads! You own it forever! Yes bonuses! Warm and fuzzies from the developer!
  • Mobile Version Android/iOS - Free! Ads give bonuses and are optional! Carry it everywhere in a futuristic pocket computer!

Use CloudSave to continue progress on any version on any device.
